title: Ep 40: This Is Forty
itunes:title: Ep 40: This Is Forty
description:
Today, this is what's important:

The 40th episode banger, Animal Crossing, Atlanta, on set protocols during the pandemic, the Oculus VR headset, VPNs, staying healthy, Ander's 40th birthday, and more.
